properties.name: Angkor Wat
properties.description: World's largest religious monument, 12th-century Khmer temple complex spanning 400 sq km

properties.name: Bayon Temple
properties.description: Enigmatic temple with 200+ giant stone faces of the Bodhisattva

properties.name: Ta Prohm
properties.description: Atmospheric temple engulfed by giant strangler fig tree roots, Tomb Raider filming location

properties.name: Tonle Sap Lake
properties.description: Southeast Asia's largest freshwater lake with floating villages
